== Test Section

[NOTE]
====
This is a note.
Second line.
====

[TIP]
====
This is a tip.
====

Test a more basic admonition.

NOTE: We recommend turning off the splines view (i.e 'Show Layer Outlines') during adjusting the track so you can see the adjustment of points clearly.
